column1: $The Winged Dragon of Ra$Unlimited$DIVINE$[Divine-Beast/Effect]$$$$$10$?$?$$$$Cannot be Special Summoned. Requires 3 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned
